name: ekontroll_api_spec
description: eKontroll - Especificaci√≥n de la API Dashboard cliente, Dashboard Despacho y Dashboard Admini

scripts.build-spec-original: cd scripts && node build-spec.js && swagger-cli validate ../spec/dist/api.yaml
scripts.build-spec-helper: func() { node scripts/build-spec.js "$1" && swagger-cli validate dist/api-"$1".yaml; }; func
